synopsis.text: Wakasa, a captivating merman, finds an unlikely refuge in the bathtub of Tatsumi, a high school student, after his own home becomes uninhabitable due to pollution. As Wakasa's new roommate, Tatsumi's ordinary life takes an extraordinary turn, with the merman's aquatic friends frequently visiting and causing a stir. Despite their contrasting personalities—Wakasa's boisterous and self-centered nature against Tatsumi's cool and caring demeanor—an endearing friendship blossoms between them. As Tatsumi introduces Wakasa and his friends to the intricacies of human life, he finds himself enjoying their childlike antics, adding a touch of magic to his daily routine. Brace yourself for an enchanting tale of friendship, discovery, and the occasional bathroom chaos!
